snippet: Hundreds of Iranians gathered Friday at Tehran Cinema Museum to celebrate Asghar Farhadi's recent Academy Awards win for best foreign language film....

headline.main: A Relative of Couscous Finds a Wider Fan Base
headline.print_headline: A Relative of Couscous Finds a Wider Fan Base

lead_paragraph: Hundreds of Iranians gathered Friday at Tehran Cinema Museum to celebrate Asghar Farhadi's recent Academy Awards win for best foreign language film.
